name: Generate Tailored Resumes, Cover Letters & Interview Prep from LinkedIn Jobs with AI
description:
# üîß How It Works
**This n8n workflow leverages an agentic AI solution, where multiple AI agents collaborate to process and generate tailored job application assets.

## ‚úÖ Features
Agent-based AI Coordination: Utilizes multiple AI agents working in sequence to analyze the job description and generate results.

### Outputs:

A customized cover letter

An optimized resume (CV)

A list of interview preparation questions

Automated Delivery: The final outputs are created as Google Docs and stored in your connected Google Drive folder.

## üßæ Input Requirement
Simply provide a LinkedIn job URL as the input.
Example: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/4184156975

# ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions
To deploy and run this workflow, you'll need to configure the following credentials:

Google Cloud Platform (GCP)

Enable the Google Drive API

Set up OAuth credentials for n8n integration

OpenAI API Key

Needed for generating the content (cover letter, CV, and questions)

BrightData (formerly Luminati)

Used to scrape and extract job details from the LinkedIn job link

‚ö†Ô∏è Setup requires moderate technical familiarity with APIs and OAuth. A step-by-step configuration guide is recommended for beginners.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.

nodes.name: Extract structured data from a single URL
Extract structured data from a single URL1

options.systemMessage:
SYSTEM
You are ‚ÄúMaster Orchestrator‚Äù, the first-pass analyst in a multi-agent r√©sum√©-tailoring chain.

GOAL  
Convert the raw job-posting & company data into a structured, fact-rich JSON object that every other agent can consume without re-scraping.

Process
1. Call Resume editor tool agent to process and get the edited resume.
2. send the edited resume, along with company details and job description to HR reviewer tool agent for review. It will return comment and score.
3. if the score is low, pass the comment back to resume editor agent to modify. 
4. Repeat the process until the score is above 75%.
5. When the end condition is reached, please make the output of the LLM paste the edited resume along with the comment mentioning edited changes and the latest HR comment.

parameters.description:
Call this tool when u got the company and job description information.HR comment & Suggestion is not exist on the first run. If the resume is reviewed by the HR agent, pass the comment, edited resume, company details and job description to this agent.
This agent is to edit resume based on comment/suggestion and company details, and job description.

Call this tool after the resume is modified by RESUME Editor Agent.
Send the edited resume, Company details, and job description to this agent so it will review and return comment and mark.

parameters.content:
Trigger: When Chat Message Received

Starts the workflow when a message is received (e.g., from Telegram, Slack, or custom UI).

Extract Structured Data from LinkedIn

Uses BrightData to scrape and extract job description from the given LinkedIn job URL.

Append Job & Company Details

Saves structured job data to internal sheets or memory for downstream agents to use.

Master Agent

Acts as the central coordinator, passing the job data to sub-agents for task-specific output.

ü§ñ Sub-Workflows (Agent Nodes)
Sub-workflows like Resume Editor, Cover Letter Writer, and Interview Coach are:

Modular AI agents with a specialized system message and prompt.

Built using a simple Agentic (LLM) structure inside the sub-workflow.

They automatically return their result to the Master Agent when complete.

‚úÖ Tip: Setting up a sub-workflow is simple‚Äîjust define the agent's role and prompt inside it. No need to manage output paths; results are passed back to the main workflow automatically.

üóÇ Output to Google Drive
Each agent's response is saved as a new Google Doc:

Create document ‚Üí generates a new Google Doc in your Drive.

Update document ‚Üí appends the generated content.

Final documents:

Cover Letter

Tailored Resume

Interview Questions & Answers
